text:
Not related to the content of the tweet but it would be good to add captions for accessibility reasons. Not sure how well Twitter supports that, though

The pinned tweet on the Julia account is also an image of text with no caption

text: Only reason this doesn’t happen right now is that we use Sprout Social for scheduling posts and this don’t supported out of the box

text:
